com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects

Class CBitmap

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CDrawable
      • com.agsw.FabricView.DrawableObjects.CBitmap

  • public class CBitmap
extends CDrawable
    Created by antwan on 10/3/2015. This drawable object represents a bitmap image.

      • CBitmap

        public CBitmap(android.graphics.Bitmap src,
               int x,
               int y,
               android.graphics.Paint p)
        Constructor. Creates a bitmap object at the specified position. The width and the height are obtained from the bitmap.
        Parameters:
        src - The source bitmap.
        x - The horizontal position.
        y - The vertical position.
        p - The paint to use.
